THERE IS A MRGL RISK OF SVR TSTMS TO THE RIGHT OF A LINE FROM 40 N
DIK 50 E N60 FAR 20 WSW AXN 35 SSE VVV 25 SSE MHE 35 E MHN 10 WNW
IML LAA CAO CVS 50 ENE ROW 40 ESE ALM 20 W SRR 20 E SAF 45 E ALS 45
WSW DEN 25 NW FCL 40 SSE DGW 40 NNW DGW 55 E WRL 40 NE JAC 30 SSW
MQM SMN 10 W BTM 20 WSW 3HT 55 ESE BIL 30 ESE 4BQ 35 N 2WX 35 WNW
DIK 40 N DIK.

GEN TSTMS ARE FCST TO THE RIGHT OF A LINE FROM 55 N BML 30 W AUG 10
